data.actual_result: The role gets tagged instead. http://i.imgur.com/pXDVbgl.png
data.short_description: When trying to tag someone, if there's a tag-able role with the name as the user or a part of the user, it tags the role instead of the user
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a role with the same name as a user (or the beginning part of his name) - Try to tag said user.
